definition: to exhibit one's feelings in one's speech
to overflow/(literary) excessive/old variant of 鎰|镒[yi4]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.chinese: 許多人都義憤填膺，溢於言表。

sentences.english: Seeing their son back, the boy's parents showed their gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 看到他們的兒子回來，小孩妁父母感激之情溢於言表。

sentences.english: His smile beamed and his happiness resonated.
sentences.chinese: 他愉快地笑着，幸福溢於言表。

sentences.english: And when the gates are opened, there He stands on the other side, and the affections are huge.
sentences.chinese: 當大門打開時，他站在門的那邊，喜悅之情溢於言表。

sentences.english: Henry's guilt was scored across his face.
